name: NSPersistentStoreAsynchronousResult
desc: A concrete class used to represent the results of an asynchronous request.

items.name: var managedObjectContext: NSManagedObjectContext
items.desc: The managed object context for the result.

items.name: var operationError: Error?
items.desc: An error that contains details if the asynchronous fetch request fails.

items.name: var progress: Progress?
items.desc: An object that reports progress for the asynchronous fetch request.

items.name: typealias NSPersistentStoreAsynchronousFetchResultCompletionBlock
items.desc: A completion block that an asynchronous fetch request calls with a result.
